entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is inviting Luna to a party. He wants to make his intentions clear that he only sees her as a friend.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is the person being invited by Harry to a party. She is excited about going and thinks it's because she's never been asked to a party before.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who can fix Harry's dyed eyebrow.

relationships.description: Harry and Luna are friends and Harry invites her to a party.
Harry asks Hermione for help in fixing his dyed eyebrow.
